GSD.product_version: versions from v5.13 to before v5.15.61
GSD.description:
PCI: mediatek-gen3: Fix refcount leak in mtk_pcie_init_irq_domains()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.61 by commit 0675fe20da7fa69b1ba80c23470c1433a2356c03, it was introduced in version v5.13 by commit 814cceebba9b7d1306b8d49587ffb0e81f7b73af. For more details please see the references link.
